attributes.action: Intervene in Syria as a matter of urgency
attributes.background: UK Government had a duty to intervene on Syria. The brutality of the Asad Government and different factions of armies are killing millions of non-combatants.

rejection.details: It is not clear from your petition what type of intervention you want the UK Government to take in Syria. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you want the Government to do.
